tns:patch.author: vlymanskyi
tns:patch.description: Insert a new record to dg_module_instance for module um:user

script.lang: INSERT INTO dg_module_instance( module_instance_id, module_name, module_instance, permitted, num_of_items_in_teaser, site_id) VALUES (nextval('dg_module_instance_seq'), 'um', 'user', 't', 1, 3);
